law.catch_line: Penalties for tax delinquency -- General laws apply.
law.text: The laws applying to penalties on and the collection of delinquent school taxes, except the taxes imposed by KRS 160.613 to 160.617 shall be the same as the general laws applying to penalties on and the collection of delinquent taxes of the taxing districts which embrace the various school districts.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 16, effective July 1, 2005. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt.V, sec. 451, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4399-40.
